General.Name: Zhejiang Weixing Industrial Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Weixing Industrial Development Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of clothing accessories in China and internationally. Its products include buttons, zippers, metal parts, plastic products, ribbons, ropes, signs, and other luggage accessories products. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Linhai, China.
General.Address: No.8 South Qian Jiang road, Linhai, China, 317000

2.Name: Mr. Jin Kun  Xie
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
